title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, embed, pull, and manage models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLM or chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting with local models, file uploads, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented-Generation template using Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain.

title: chatbox-ai
summary: Cross-platform desktop client (Electron) that connects to Ollama, OpenAI, and others with prompt library and data persistence.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS-Code extension bringing local Ollama models inline as GitHub-Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and model switching.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for Ollama written in Rust and React.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat, generate code, and refactor using local Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that exposes OpenAI-compatible REST endpoints backed by Ollama for rapid prototyping.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, embeddings, and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app plus REST API that wraps Ollama for multi-user chat inside PostgreSQL-backed web service.

title: ollama-keras
summary: Experimental Keras 3 callback enabling fine-tune/resume of local LLaMA models via Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into threads with slash commands and model picker.

title: awesome-ollama
summary: Curated list of tools, integrations, tutorials, and model mods for the Ollama ecosystem.
